data.title: Owen Wilson spotted getting close to 21-year-old college tennis star Wan-Yi Sweeting, sparking rumours of romance
data.meta_description: He has a reputation as a bit of a ladies man - but actor Owen Wilson has once again sparked romance rumours after being spotted with a 21-year-old college tennis...
data.text:
He has a reputation as a bit of a ladies man – but actor Owen Wilson has once again sparked romance rumours after being spotted with a 21-year-old college tennis player at the French Open.

The Zoolander star – who has been filming the sequel to the 2001 hit alongside co-star Ben Stiller – was seen laughing and joking with Wan-Yi Sweeting as they watched the action at the Stade Roland Garros on Friday.

According to The Sun Owen, who is 25 years older than Wan-Li, has bonded with his new companion over their love of tennis – and they certainly seemed to be getting on very well as they sat courtside.

Although the actor has never married, he has two children by previous partners as well as being romantically involved with a string of celebrities.

He previously dated singer Sheryl Crow in the early 2000s, and also had a relationship with actress Kate Hudson after they met on the set of the 2006 film You, Me and Dupree.

The pair had reportedly been planning to marry in 2008 but split for good the following year.

Owen went on to father his first child, Robert Ford Wilson, with girlfriend Jade Duell in 2011, although they broke up just months later.

He also welcomed a second son, Finn Lindqvist Wilson, with personal trainer Caroline Lindqvist last year, although she later told People magazine they were ‘not planning’ on taking their relationship further.

The actor will be bringing his model alter-ego Hansel back to cinema screens early next year when Zoolander 2 is released.
